cast.name: 德洛丽丝·赫雷迪亚 Dolores Heredia
杰苏斯·欧乔阿 Jesús Ochoa

writer.name: José Luis García Agraz José Luis García Agraz

director.name: José Luis García Agraz José Luis García Agraz

introduction: ◎简　　介One of the most celebrated Mexican films of the 1990s, DESERTED SEAS (DESIERTOS MARES) was the winner of three Ariels (the Mexican Academy Award) in 1994: Best Director, Best Screenplay, and Best Original Story. The film centers around the figure of a veteran filmmaker, with three other people circling around the pivotal character. While trying to finish his latest film, the director must cope with the losses in his life--a recently deceased father, and a wife who has left him--that have driven him to drink. But when a beautiful young filmmaker enters his life, he sees in her the chance to get his life and film back on track. DESERTED SEAS was directed byJos?Luis Garc Agraz, a critical and awards darling in Mexico.
